- refactor
- docs

### Related Issue
- Please link the issue(s) this PR addresses:
  Closes #<issue_number>

### Description
- Describe the task or work being completed.
- Explain why this change is needed and what it achieves.
- Include any context, notes, or details helpful for reviewers.

### Implementation Details
- Describe changes made to complete the task:
  - Step 1
  - Step 2
- Dependencies added or removed
- Notes on migration or backward compatibility (if applicable)

### Testing
- [ ] Manual testing performed
- [ ] Unit / Integration tests added if applicable
- [ ] Tests passing locally

### Documentation
- [ ] Documentation updated if relevant
- [ ] Changelog entry added if applicable

### Checklist
- [ ] Linked related issue(s)
- [ ] Task clearly described
- [ ] PR self-reviewed and ready

### Risks / Impact
- Potential side effects
- Areas requiring attention during review

### Notes
- Additional information, screenshots, logs, or instructions for QA/review.
